name: The Seven Gates of Jambala
storyline: An old wizard has a student Dravion. During practicing a spell casting the young student is teleported to a fantasy realm called Jambala. Dravion must find seven pieces of the Great Want in order to return to his home world. In order to find all the pieces he must visit seven cities of which each has one piece.
summary: It is a 1989 platform video game. The gameplay is focused on spell casting and exploring, like for example talking to merchants in order to find new info. Every gate of Jambala is guarded by a boss.
